story:
What a wonderful idea! Here's a bedtime story for your little one:

Title: The Magical Journey of Surya and the Starlight

In the land of the gods, there was a small village called Tanah Surya, where the sun rises and sets over the vast rice fields. In this village, there lived a curious and adventurous boy named Surya, who had a heart full of wonder and a mind full of questions.

One night, as Surya was lying in his bed, he looked up at the starry sky and felt a strange sensation, as if the stars were calling out to him. He jumped out of bed and ran outside into the garden, where he saw a beautiful, shimmering light hovering above the tamarind tree.

 Suddenly, the light disappeared, and Surya felt himself being lifted off the ground. He soared upwards, higher and higher, until he was floating among the stars. The villagers below looked up and saw Surya twinkling like a tiny star, his laughter and wonder echoing through the night air.

As Surya explored the starry expanse, he met a wise old star named Sang Hyang Putih, who told him the secrets of the universe. Sang Hyang Putih took Surya on a magical journey, visiting distant planets and witnessing the wonders of the cosmos. They danced among the shooting stars, chased the constellations, and even met the mythical creatures that lived among the stars.

As the night wore on, Surya began to miss his family and friends back in Tanah Surya. Sang Hyang Putih smiled and said, "The magic of the stars can take you anywhere, but it's also important to remember the love of those who are dear to you." With a nod, Surya felt himself being gently guided back down to the village.

As he descended, Surya looked down and saw his village, its lights twinkling like diamonds. His heart full of joy and wonder, he returned to his bed, where he snuggled under the covers and drifted off to sleep, his dreams filled with the magic of the stars.

And so, little one, whenever you look up at the stars, remember Surya's magical journey and the secrets of the universe that lie within your reach. May your heart always be filled with wonder, curiosity, and the magic of the stars.

Goodnight, child! May your slumber be as soft as the moonlight and your dreams as vibrant as the colors of the sunset in Tanah Surya.
